attributes.action: Cap pay and pensions of those in banking and other areas where exhorbitant fees are paid across all countries of the world
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bankers have done much damage to this and other countries, yet they command ridiculousy vast sums. To prevent them playing one country off against another, world-wide capping is necessary.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions that already exist on this subject:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/bank-greed/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/recoup-bonuses/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Antidote/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
